articles.author: Brian Mahoney
articles.title: Pacers aim for second NBA Finals appearance, Knicks face uphill battle - AP News
articles.description: Jalen Brunson scored 32 points, Karl-Anthony Towns added 24 points and 13 rebounds despite a bruised left knee and the New York Knicks stayed alive in the Eastern Conference finals by beating the Indiana Pacers 111-94 on Thursday night in Game 5. The Knicks w…
